HTMLInputElementValueAsNumber.summary: The valueAsNumber property of the interface represents the current value of the {{htmlelement("input")}} element as a number or NaN if converting to a numeric value is not possible.

remarks.para: This property can also be set directly, for example to set a default numeric value based on some condition.

HTMLInputElementValueAsNumber.value: A number that represents the value of the element or NaN if numeric conversion is impossible.
